```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
using Landfire
```

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
public_names = filter(names(Landfire; all=true)) do name
    name != :Landfire && Base.ispublic(Landfire, name)
end

println("""
<button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary mb-3" id="toggle-all-callouts">Expand All</button>
<script>
document.getElementById('toggle-all-callouts').addEventListener('click', function() {
  var btn = this;
  var bodies = document.querySelectorAll('.callout-collapse.collapse');
  var allOpen = Array.from(bodies).every(function(el) { return el.classList.contains('show'); });
  bodies.forEach(function(el) {
    var bsCollapse = bootstrap.Collapse.getOrCreateInstance(el, {toggle: false});
    allOpen ? bsCollapse.hide() : bsCollapse.show();
  });
  btn.textContent = allOpen ? 'Expand All' : 'Collapse All';
});
</script>
""")

# Table of contents
for name in public_names
    binding = getfield(Landfire, name)
    kind = binding isa Type ? "type" : binding isa Function ? "function" : "constant"
    println("- [`$name`](#$(lowercase(string(name)))) *($(kind))*")
end
println()

# Detailed sections
for name in public_names
    binding = getfield(Landfire, name)
    kind = binding isa Type ? "type" : binding isa Function ? "function" : "constant"
    doc = string(Docs.doc(binding))
    println("""
    ::: {.callout-note collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
    ## `$name` [*($(kind))*]{.text-muted}

    $doc
    :::
    """)
end
```
